title: Instance-Dependent Bounds for Zeroth-order Lipschitz Optimization with Error Certificates. (arXiv:2102.01977v5 [math.ST] CROSS LISTED)
abstract: We study the problem of zeroth-order (black-box) optimization of a Lipschitz function $f$ defined on a compact subset $\mathcal X$ of $\mathbb R^d$, with the additional constraint that algorithms must certify the accuracy of their recommendations. We characterize the optimal number of evaluations of any Lipschitz function $f$ to find and certify an approximate maximizer of $f$ at accuracy $\varepsilon$. Under a weak assumption on $\mathcal X$, this optimal sample complexity is shown to be nearly proportional to the integral $\int_{\mathcal X} \mathrm{d}\boldsymbol x/( \max(f) - f(\boldsymbol x) + \varepsilon )^d$. This result, which was only (and partially) known in dimension $d=1$, solves an open problem dating back to 1991. In terms of techniques, our upper bound relies on a packing bound by Bouttier al. translated_title: 带误差证明的零阶Lipschitz优化中的实例相关界限
translated_abstract: 我们研究了定义在 $\mathbb{R}^d$ 的紧致子集 $\mathcal{X}$ 上的Lipschitz函数 $f$ 的零阶（黑箱）优化问题，算法必须证明其推荐的准确性。在对 $\mathcal{X}$ 的一个较弱假设下，我们表征了任何 Lipschitz 函数 $f$ 寻找并证明 $\varepsilon$ 精度下近似最大值的最优评估次数。在维度 $d=1$ 的情况下这个结果只部分地被知道，它解决了一个可以追溯到1991年的开放问题。在技术方面，我们的上界依赖于 Bouttier 等人（2020）为 Piyavskii-Shubert 算法提供的一种打包界限，我们将其链接到上述积分上。我们还表明，可计算的 DOO 算法的证明版本与这些打包界限相匹配。
tldr: 本文研究了一个Lipschitz函数f在紧致子集X上的零阶（黑箱）优化问题，要求算法需证明推荐的准确性。我们解决了这个问题的开放问题，给出了任何Lipschitz函数f寻找近似最大值的最优样本复杂度，并提供了相应的界限。
en_tdlr: This paper studies the problem of zeroth-order optimization of a Lipschitz function f on a compact subset X of Rd, with the additional constraint that algorithms must certify the accuracy of their recommendations. We solve an open problem dating back to 1991, giving the optimal sample complexity for finding an approximate maximizer of f at accuracy ε, and provide the corresponding bounds.
